sqlMap.insert: insert into course_video (course_video_no, course_video_link, course_video_title, course_video_description, course_video_attached, course_video_permit, course_video_order, course_no) values (course_video_no_seq.nextval, #link#, #title#, #description#, #attached#, #permit#, #order#, #course.no#)
